name: Hoop Sports
description:
A top-down sports game with annoyingly bouncy characters. Slam into the ball and other players in 3 different game modes. This is a showcase of a physics system I created and shoehorned into a university project. Built entirely in Processing ;-;

Features:

- Bouncing and sliding physics with pixel-accurate collision

- Up to 256 in-game AI players with distinct behaviors for each game mode

- 3 game modes: football, bumpers (bump enemies into the goal), and dodgeball

- Extremely irritating sound effects
